name: static-link
description: This utility provides a means to statically-link all your dependencies into a single static-filesystem that is patched into node's module loader.

scripts.compile: tsc  && node ./.scripts/rewrite-loader.js && uglifyjs --beautify "beautify=true,indent_level=2" ./dist/lib/static-loader.js -o ./dist/lib/static-loader.js && shx cp node_modules/yarn/lib/* ./dist
scripts.restore: shx rm package-lock.json && shx rm -rf ./node_modules/ && npm install
scripts.reinstall: rmdir /s /q node_modules 2> nul && erase  package-lock.json 2> nul && erase yarn.lock 2> nul  && npm install

author: Garrett Serack
